column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////There are different sizes for the pizza. You can get your own personal one or get a small for 2
column4: etc. We decided to share the Malnati Chicago Classic which comes with lots of cheese
column6: and sausage and of course that famous deep dish style. They do have a large selection of beer so we ordered one each. The pizza took about 30 minutes to arrive
